reviewtext: This product is made in China and runs for ten seconds one cycle at a time with automatic rewind and no sound or video accompanying.  This product is not like the previous head cleaner which had four cycles of aproximately two minutes each with a sound and video format.  I liked the original product much, much better - not happy. Try to find Maxell SKU: 290058, UPC: 025215290053, to see if it does the job.
